bibl.title: Metal Objects from the Fayoum in the Collection of the Coptic Museum in Cairo.
bibl.note: Profane objects, principally archaeological material from late antiquity, and Christian objects, liturgical furniture from medieval or more recent times.

bibl.title: Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause

bibl.seg: BÉNAZETH Dominique, Metal Objects from the Fayoum in the Collection of the Coptic Museum in Cairo.

Gawdat GABRA (Ed.), Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause (Cairo - New York, 2005) pp. 103-117, 6 figg.
Profane objects, principally archaeological material from late antiquity, and Christian objects, liturgical furniture from medieval or more recent times.
